Thousands of Russians vote in Serbia, Montenegro, many say they oppose PutinThousands of Russian citizens in Serbia and Montenegro voted on Sunday in their home nation's presidential election, with many saying it was a symbolic gesture that would not impact President Vladimir Putin's bid for another six-year term. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:12:01 GMT FHB4OAS32JKYPPO3R7P5T3KSSQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/thousands- Russians-vote-serbia-montenegro-many-say-they-oppose-putin-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Putin wins Russian presidential election with 87.97% of the vote, first official results showVladimir Putin has won Russia's presidential election with 87.97% of the vote, according to the first official results showed on Sunday after polls closed. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 18:09:47 GMT 26KUZDC2U5ILVFFCNUWH3IR364 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-wins- Russian-presidential-election-with-8797-votes-first-official-results-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
EU's von der Leyen says Gaza facing famine, ceasefire needed rapidlyEuropean Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Sunday that Gaza was facing famine and there had to be a rapid ceasefire agreement in the war between Israel and Hamas. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 16:51:41 GMT BDMVS2L7NVNDVH3MPVQYL6TTFU https://www.reuters.com/world/eus-von-der-leyen-says-gaza-faceing-famine-ceasefire-urgently-needed-2024-03-17/Reuters世界
Vietnam's parliament to meet over 'personnel issues', says letter to legislatorsVietnam's parliament is set to meet on Thursday to discuss unspecified "personnel issues", according to a letter sent to legislators seen by Reuters, amid speculation of a reshuffle of the Communist-ruled country's top leadership. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 16:37:57 GMT JCAC5DOCJVK3PKDV34XLTC2DSA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-parliament-meets-over-personnel-issues-says-letter-legislators-2024-03-17/Francesco Guarascio世界亚太地区
Ukraine says Russian missile attack on Mykolaiv city injures 6At least six people were wounded in a Russian missile attack on the Black Sea port city of Mykolaiv on Sunday, Ukrainian officials said, after an overnight strike on the port of Odesa on the last day of Russia's presidential election. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 16:24:00 GMT CACHPTHUPVMG7G7Y46PBK3M6I4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says- Russian-missile-attack-injures-mykolaiv-city-6-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian emigres in Armenia stand in line to vote against PutinAt least a thousand anti-Kremlin Russian emigres queued for hours outside their embassy in Armenia on Sunday, waiting to cast ballots in presidential election they admit they have little chance of influencing. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 15:30:16 GMT EH46QQNZ5NOIHLCWZ36AZ4AMYU https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-emigres-armenia-stand-line-vote-against-putin-2024-03-17/Reuters世界
Swiss police stop far-right Austrian politician speaking at eventA far-right Austrian politician was stopped by the police from speaking at an event in the Swiss canton of Aargau on Saturday after the organisers didn't comply with a police request for the event to be cancelled. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 15:19:11 GMT LSTY2QVDT5LRFOEYHI6QJNM7LA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-police-stop-far-right-austrian-politician-speaking-event-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Some Russians flock to Navalny's grave to 'cast their vote,' TV footage showsDozens of Russians flocked to Alexei Navalny's grave in Moscow on Sunday to symbolically cast their vote for the late opposition politician on the last day of Russia's presidential election, TV footage showed. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 14:49:23 GMT 2RHFKC23TJKI3CXQDZP5NO3H5Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/some- Russian-flock-navalnys-grave-cast-their-vote-tv-footage-shows-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Netanyahu says Schumer call for Israel election was inappropriateIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu told CNN on Sunday that U.S. Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer's speech in which he urged new elections in Israel was "totally inappropriate." Sun, 17 Mar 2024 13:54:27 GMT 5CA22DPZ6VLG5L24PLFCSNFQIM https://www.reuters.com/world/netanyahu-says-schumer-speech-calling-israeli-election-was-inproper-2024-03-17/Kanishka Singh世界
Thousands of Russians join Navalny-inspired 'noon against Putin' election protestThousands of people turned up at polling stations in Russia and capitals across the world on Sunday to take part in what the anti-Kremlin opposition said was a peaceful but symbolic protest against the re-election of President Vladimir Putin. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 12:30:54 GMT TUQM654OCJO5BP3P53IZK4QC6E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/noon-against-putin-thousands-of-Russians-turn-out-fulfil-navalnys-last-wish-2024-03-17/Guy Faulconbridge, Andrew Osborn世界欧洲
Germany's Scholz say Rafah assault would make regional peace 'very difficult'The large number of civilian casualties that would result from an Israeli assault on the Gaza city of Rafah would make regional peace "very difficult", German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Sunday after talks with Jordanian King Abdullah. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 11:45:59 GMT OQPCSNL7HZOXHMUNLVPE4ITN5E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/germany-scholz-says-rafah-assault-could-make-regional-peace-very-difficult-2024-03-17/Sarah Marsh世界中东地区
